channel.title: The Phone Show
channel.description: The Phone Show is a weekly show hosted by RedBoxChiliPepper and linear each Monday night from 10pm until 11am Pacific Standard Time. You can listen to it online at party934.com or on 102.5 FM if you\'re in the Hudson Valley area of New York.
channel.itunes:author: Brad Carter
channel.itunes:subtitle: Playing music and taking your phone calls.
channel.itunes:summary: The Phone Show is a weekly show hosted by RedBoxChiliPepper and linear each Monday night from 11pm until 12am Pacific Standard Time. You can listen to it online at party934.com or on 102.5 FM if you\'re in the Hudson Valley area of New York.

item.title: The Phone Show - 2-2-2010 - LOST
item.description: linear, RBCP and Spessa host tonight, doing a show in spite of it being season premiere night of Lost Season 6. Most music has the word Lost in it. People call in spoilers to Lost. ROXY CALLS IN and we turn the tables on her prank call request. el_jefe is dead. Legend emails RBCP naked pics of Debbie Gibson and Tiffany, apparently from his Taxicab. Tombstone emails RBCP, LIVE ON THE SHOW! RBCP unleashes the most awesome idea ever unto the world. That calls for a Wilhelm Scream!
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: linear, RBCP and Spessa - LOST
item.itunes:summary: linear, RBCP and Spessa host tonight, doing a show in spite of it being season premiere night of Lost Season 6. Most music has the word Lost in it. People call in spoilers to Lost. ROXY CALLS IN and we turn the tables on her prank call request. el_jefe is dead. Legend emails RBCP naked pics of Debbie Gibson and Tiffany, apparently from his Taxicab. Tombstone emails RBCP, LIVE ON THE SHOW! RBCP unleashes the most awesome idea ever unto the world. That calls for a Wilhelm Scream!

item.title: The Phone Show - 1-26-2010 - Disco Mickey Mouse
item.description: RBCP and Spessa host tonight. Lots of Disco Mickey Mouse is played, Spessa is propositioned for rape at a discount price, then the hotel clerk goes AWOL, the show ends with an interview with RBCP interviewing a T-Mobile rep in an attempt to testing out Skype equipment earlier in the week.
item.guid: The Phone Show - 1-26-2010 - Disco Mickey Mouse
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Spessa - Disco Mickey Mouse
item.itunes:summary: RBCP and Spessa host tonight. Lots of Disco Mickey Mouse is played, Spessa is propositioned for rape at a discount price, then the hotel clerk goes AWOL, the show ends with an interview with RBCP interviewing a T-Mobile rep in an attempt to testing out Skype equipment earlier in the week.

item.title: The Phone Show - 1-19-2010 - Ugly Eyes
item.description: RBCP and linear host tonight because Spessa is in the hospital in a full body cast. Shitpickle posts a few Craigslist ads for us, which makes us a brand new friend with ugly eyes. We apologize to Carlito, try to call Randy, call more Facebook people, Roxy finally figures out how to listen to the show after a year of trying, Rogueclown is on American Idol.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and linear - Ugly Eyes
item.itunes:summary: RBCP and linear host tonight because Spessa is in the hospital in a full body cast. Shitpickle posts a few Craigslist ads for us, which makes us a brand new friend with ugly eyes. We apologize to Carlito, try to call Randy, call more Facebook people, Roxy finally figures out how to listen to the show after a year of trying, Rogueclown is on American Idol.

item.title: The Phone Show - 1-12-2010 - Snopes
item.description: RBCP, linear and Spessa talk about Snopes discrediting Sign Hacker and get some station IDs from listeners. We call Randy's mom again, but she's boring.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Snopes
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, linear and Spessa talk about Snopes discrediting Sign Hacker and get some station IDs from listeners. We call Randy's mom again, but she's boring.

item.title: The Phone Show - 1-5-2010 - Welcome to Cacti Radio, Carlito!
item.description: RBCP, linear and Spessa ask what everyones favorite hacker movies are. Randy Dandy threatens to shoot RBCP, a guy calls in asking for help with his CB radio, linear premieres his brand new show on Cacti Radio.
item.guid: The Phone Show - 1-5-2010 - No Small Talk
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Welcome to Cacti Radio, Carlito!
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, linear and Spessa ask what everyones favorite hacker movies are. Randy Dandy threatens to shoot RBCP, a guy calls in asking for help with his CB radio, linear premieres his brand new show on Cacti Radio.

item.title: The Phone Show - 12-29-2009 - No Small Talk
item.description: RBCP, linear and Spessa host. Trevelyn calls in for the FIRST TIME EVER, we take a good hard look at the motherfuckin' phone, Tombstone loves Schaffer the Darklord, Retardo The Lardo doesn't answer the phone, VOICEMAILS!, a no smalltalk policy is put into place, someone places a Craigslist ad for the show, RBCP demands some conviction from a battered wife, Crazynesphreak helps answer some calls, Alan Rickman yells at us for the noise, some guys thinks we should give blind people cars.
item.guid: The Phone Show - 12-29-2009 - No Small Talk
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - No Small Talk
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, linear and Spessa host. Trevelyn calls in for the FIRST TIME EVER, we take a good hard look at the motherfuckin' phone, Tombstone loves Schaffer the Darklord, Retardo The Lardo doesn't answer the phone, VOICEMAILS!, a no smalltalk policy is put into place, someone places a Craigslist ad for the show, RBCP demands some conviction from a battered wife, Crazynesphreak helps answer some calls, Alan Rickman yells at us for the noise, some guys thinks we should give blind people cars.

item.title: The Phone Show - 12-22-2009
item.description: RBCP, Jessica and Anne host tonight. And they were worth every penny. Skunkworks constructs a bucket of water, we try to get Arox kicked out of a bar but he hooks up with the bartender instead, we trick a Hollywood Video employee out of a phone number.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, Jessica and Anne - Trainwreck
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, Jessica and Anne host tonight. And they were worth every penny. Skunkworks constructs a bucket of water, we try to get Arox kicked out of a bar but he hooks up with the bartender instead, we trick a Hollywood Video employee out of a phone number.

item.title: The Phone Show - 12-15-2009
item.description: linear, RBCP, Spessa and Jessica. Not enough people call so we resort to prank calling numbers that people post in the chat room. Spessa makes an announcement via Jessica The Translator. linear hates on RBCP's cell phone, but he's using linux so RBCP just doesn't care.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and linear - Resorting to prank calls
item.itunes:summary: linear, RBCP, Spessa and Jessica. Not enough people call so we resort to prank calling numbers that people post in the chat room. Spessa makes an announcement via Jessica The Translator. linear hates on RBCP's cell phone, but he's using linux so RBCP just doesn't care.

item.title: The Phone Show - 12-08-2009
item.description: linear and RBCP host. They call up phone numbers that they find on Twitter, hoping to anger people and failing miserably at it.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and linear - Twitter Calls
item.itunes:summary: linear and RBCP host. They call up phone numbers that they find on Twitter, hoping to anger people and failing miserably at it.

item.title: The Phone Show - 12-01-2009
item.description: This week we get racist on Motel 6 workers by request, linear's team loses at hockey and our stream keeps breaking near the end so we continue the show for an extra half hour so.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Fucking Indians
item.itunes:summary: This week we get racist on Motel 6 workers by request, linear's team loses at hockey and our stream keeps breaking near the end so we continue the show for an extra half hour so.

item.title: The Phone Show - 11-24-2009
item.description: Our first show on our very own network. We actually have no technical issues during the show, 26 listeners and a chat room chock full of people who are not getting booted for being hilarious. linear, Spessa and RBCP prank call some people on Facebook.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Facebook Phone Numbers
item.itunes:summary: Our first show on our very own network. We actually have no technical issues during the show, 26 listeners and a chat room chock full of people who are not getting booted for being hilarious. linear, Spessa and RBCP prank call some people on Facebook.

item.title: The Phone Show - 11-17-2009
item.description: Broadcasting from our own network that actually has a name this week. This episode was sponsored by www.universal-radio.com! Well not really, but Spessa loves them a lot. About 10 or 15 minutes of this show was lost because of issues with our broadcasting software, so there's no Google segment by Skunkworks this week. Sad.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Cacti Radio
item.itunes:summary: Broadcasting from our own network that actually has a name this week. This episode was sponsored by www.universal-radio.com! Well not really, but Spessa loves them a lot. About 10 or 15 minutes of this show was lost because of issues with our broadcasting software, so there's no Google segment by Skunkworks this week. Sad.

item.title: The Phone Show - 11-10-2009
item.description: Spessa is live in the studio and linear is cohosting too. This is our first and last show on Manic Radio since they hated our carefree attitudes. Unfortunately the end of this show is a little messed up. Thanks, Skunkworks, for recording this for us since our recording didn't happen for some reason.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - Manic Radio
item.itunes:summary: Spessa is live in the studio and linear is cohosting too. This is our first and last show on Manic Radio since they hated our carefree attitudes. Unfortunately the end of this show is cut off. Thanks, Skunkworks, for recording this for us since our recording didn't happen for some reason.

item.title: The Phone Show - 11-02-2009
item.description: RBCP and Spessa host this episode where we attemp to determine the winners of PLA's pumpkin carving contest. We get calls from Handler, Skunkworks, not kevin, legend and a bunch of other people who I'm too tired to remember.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Spessa - Pumpkin Judging
item.itunes:summary: RBCP and Spessa host this episode where we attemp to determine the winners of PLA's pumpkin carving contest. We get calls from Handler, Skunkworks, not kevin, legend and a bunch of other people who I'm too tired to remember.

item.title: The Phone Show - 10-26-2009
item.description: RBCP, linear and Spessa host this episode. We get calls from RogueClown, RTF, Tombstone and others. Technical difficulties abound in this one as the stream dies several times, Skype crashes a lot and the sound levels are all over the place.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, Spessa and linear - technical difficulties
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, linear and Spessa host this episode. We get calls from RogueClown, RTF, Tombstone and others. Technical difficulties abound in this one as the stream dies several times, Skype crashes a lot and the sound levels are all over the place.

item.title: The Phone Show - 10-19-2009
item.description: RBCP, linear and Spessa host this episode. We get calls from RogueClown, RTF, Skunkworks, Phiz and some people on 4chan. We discuss the new policy regarding no live prank calls on our show anymore.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and the Spessas - new policies
item.itunes:summary: RBCP, linear and Spessa host this episode. We get calls from RogueClown, RTF, Skunkworks, Phiz and some people on 4chan. We discuss the new policy regarding no live prank calls on our show anymore.

item.title: The Phone Show - 10-05-2009
item.description: Mr. and Mrs. Spessa cohost live in our makeshift studio (the floor) as we call 1-900 number psychics and sex lines. No calls are taken, but we take feedback from listeners via the chatbox on notla.com.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and the Spessas - 1-900 number sex lines and psychics
item.itunes:summary: Mr. and Mrs. Spessa cohost live in our makeshift studio (the floor) as we call 1-900 number psychics and sex lines. No calls are taken, but we take feedback from listeners via the chatbox on notla.com.

item.title: The Phone Show - 09-21-2009
item.description: Spessa cohosts by phone. A former T-Mobile rep calls in and we force her to talk about work. Jessica calls and gets us to prank call a lady which turns out to be funny. And we premiere the hit single Play The Game by Redbox and the Chilipeppers.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Spessa - T-Mobile rep, Jessica gets us to prank someone, Play The Game premiere.
item.itunes:summary: Spessa cohosts by phone. A former T-Mobile rep calls in and we force her to talk about work. Jessica calls and gets us to prank call a lady which turns out to be funny. And we premiere the hit single Play The Game by Redbox and the Chilipeppers.

item.title: The Phone Show - 09-07-2009
item.description: Spessa is live in the Phone Show studio once again, but there is no on-air abortion false promises this week. We take a few calls and nothing spectacular happens.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Spessa - Nothing Spectacular Happens!
item.itunes:summary: Spessa is live in the Phone Show studio once again, but there is no on-air abortion false promises this week. We take a few calls and nothing spectacular happens.

item.title: The Phone Show - 08-31-2009
item.description: Spessa is live in the Phone Show studio for an on-the-air abortion! Linear cohosts too and we take a lot of calls and hold a contest at the end, which Phish Phreak wins.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Spessa - The Abortion Show!
item.itunes:summary: Spessa is live in the Phone Show studio for an on-the-air abortion! Linear cohosts too and we take a lot of calls and hold a contest at the end, which Phish Phreak wins.

item.title: The Phone Show - 08-03-2009
item.description: The Defcon 17 Wrapup Show. linear and Rogueclown cohost tonight and we talk about our adventures at Defcon 17. Spessa also calls in for most of the show to yell at callers. Whitesword calls in and we make fun of tr0n for a bit.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP, linear and Rogueclown - Defcon Wrapup
item.itunes:summary: The Defcon 17 Wrapup Show. linear and Rogueclown cohost tonight and we talk about our adventures at Defcon 17. Spessa also calls in for most of the show to yell at callers. Whitesword calls in and we make fun of tr0n for a bit.

item.title: The Phone Show - 07-27-2009
item.description: RTF calls in and ends up being the cohost for the night.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Rob T. Firefly cohost.
item.itunes:summary: RTF calls in and ends up being the cohost for the night.

item.title: The Phone Show - 07-20-2009
item.description: Spessa cohosts. The question of the night is: Whats the most illegal thing you've done this week?
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: RBCP and Spessa cohost.
item.itunes:summary: Spessa cohosts. The question of the night is: Whats the most illegal thing you've done this week?

item.title: The Phone Show - 07-13-2009
item.description: linear cohosts!
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: Playing music and taking your phone calls.
item.itunes:summary: linear cohosts!

item.title: The Phone Show - 07-06-2009
item.description: Tonight we call psychic hotlines and give callers psychic readings. You'll hear readings for RTF, Rogue Clown, Jenn from thisisarecording.com and Scott The Robot. You'll also hear Mr. Spessa pretend to be a crazy man obsessed with Jonbenet Ramsey and Spessa will request winning lotto numbers. This show lasted a record 2 hours long, but it's about 90 minutes on the feed since we cut out most of the music.
item.itunes:author: Brad Carter
item.itunes:subtitle: Playing music and taking your phone calls.

This show lasted a record 2 hours long, but it's about 90 minutes on the feed since we cut out most of the music.
